Slowbro (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0079: Slowpoke
Pokémon
#0081: Magnemite →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Slowbro (TCG Pocket).

Slowbro has been featured on 24 different cards since it debuted in the Fossil expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Slowbro cards are normally Water-type, Psychic-type, or Darkness-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Slowbro

Slowbro
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
